amendment.description: An amendment numbered 18 printed in Part C of House Report 118-559 to use the Holman Rule to reduce the salary of Secretary Mayorkas to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 200 - 208, 1 Present (Roll no. 287).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 200 - 208, 1 Present (Roll no. 287).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
